articles.title: US Covid-19 deaths: December is the deadliest month since the pandemic began -- and projections for January are 'nightmarish' - msnNOW
articles.description: December has been the nation's deadliest month since the Covid-19 pandemic's start -- with more than 63,000 Americans lost to the virus in the past 26 days.

articles.title: Despite hi-tech advances, many Europeans wary of taking COVID shot - Reuters
articles.description: Europe rolled out a huge COVID-19 vaccination drive on Sunday to try to rein in the coronavirus pandemic but many Europeans are sceptical about the speed at which the vaccines have been tested and approved and reluctant to have the shot.
